alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Nash; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 15 at 6:09PM EDT until August 15 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Edgecombe County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Nash County in central North Carolina... Central Wilson County in central North Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Rocky Mount, Wilson, Elm City, Sharpsburg, Tar River Reservoir and New Hope. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
